description:
It’s a battle between Siegs’s Valkyries and Kaiba’s Blue-Eyes White Dragon!  Siegs quickly gains the advantage by destroying Kaiba’s monsters before he can even draw them!  With Siegs’s army growing in strength while Kaiba’s forces falter, Siegs is unstoppable!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Valkyrie vs Blue Eyes White Dragon
戦女神[ワルキューレ]VS青眼の白龍[ブルーアイズ・ホワイトドラゴン]
